abilities.name: Amphibious.
abilities.description: The bullywug can breathe air and water.

abilities.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads.
abilities.description: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

abilities.name: Swamp Camouflage.
abilities.description: The bullywug has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

abilities.name: Standing Leap.
abilities.description: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 ft. and its high jump is up to 10 ft., with or without a running start.
